website_summaries.verdict: Puma tweaked one of their iconic silhouettes with women's timeless accessory - the Bow. The Puma Suede Bow features sweet elements while keeping all the sporty heritage. The majority of buyers praised the ornate aspects giving a fun take on the classic profile.This model also received admiration for its utmost comfort and durability crafted with high-quality materials. As a whole, this kick is strongly suggested for buyers who want to strut a kick with statement appeal without surrendering the comfort and durability.
pros: Most buyers applaud the stunning and lovely design of the Puma Suede Bow
The majority of the reviewers highly recommend this model to their peers
A large percentage of buyers praise this kick for its excellent comfort that is suitable for all-day use
The durability of the Puma Suede Bow is praiseworthy, many buyers have shared
Few reviewers notice that this kick is made of quality materials
Not many online buyers find this pair more pleasant in the actual than the pictures posted online
Many love the multiple charming colorways offered in the market
Puma offers this at an affordable price range
cons: An online buyer shares that Puma Suede Bow looks more vibrant online that the one she received

customer_reviews.title: Lovely trainers but the sizes are very small
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainers, unfortunately I had to send them back. I’m a normal size 5 shoe however the size was so small I couldn’t get them on at all. I’d recommend ordering one size up. Good communication with the seller. If you buy a pair and have to send them back you have to pay for the return and you dont get re-imbursed
customer_reviews.author: julia a.

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainers
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are lovely and the price was amazing, delivery was super fast, came much quicker than expected (the next day).
customer_reviews.author: Fran123

customer_reviews.title: Great price and girly
customer_reviews.text: I loved the original pair that I have so much (black and white) that I bought another pair in a different colour. Lovely bright colour for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: sammyjo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these... Very comfortable to wear and look great Very fashionable.. Beautiful colour with stunning bow... Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great colour
customer_reviews.text: Received so many nice comments from people about these trainers love em!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Puma bow trainers, just buy
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my daughter, she loved them, it's her favourite colour
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.text: my daughter wanted them for christmas and thats what she got everyones happy

customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers first class delivery and true to size

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes the fit and quality are both great. True to size for my feet. I have narrow feet and these are a good fit

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased :)
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pumps, so nice in fact I bought them in another colour too - great fit and very good quality :)
customer_reviews.author: Boo

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Suede Bow WN's Trainers
product_meta.description: Part of Puma classic shoes, the suede is one of the shoe that built the success of the GERMAN sports brand. As part of every Street community from the 80's on, the suede has even been involved in historical matter on a global scale. Using elastic laces, the suede bow features a rich classical suede upper with a nice satin bow attached on the heel and on top of the famous narrow suede tooling. The very feminine silhouette echoes to the popular Puma Heart, bringing originality and femininity together.
feature_bullets: Womens Puma Suede Bow Trainers in shell pink.Puma's iconic sneaker, updated with feminine satin styling.- Full suede upper.- Pull-on construction with elasticated laces.- Perforations to sides provide added breathability.- Padded collar and tongue.- Synthetic leather lining to heel.- Comfortable mesh lining.- Removable insole.- Rubber outsole with ridged tooling to front
